ygData.subject: Re: Unfair?
ygData.msgSnippet: Remember that skill called channeling ??  That is causes you to regain your concentration in battle.  The higher your channeling skill, the more often you ll
ygData.messageBody:
Remember that skill called 'channeling'?? That is causes you to regain your
concentration in battle. The higher your channeling skill, the more often
you'll regain your concentration after being hit. My channeling is
currently 110 and it kicks in all the time during battle ;) I have heard
rumors that eventually, once in gets up in the 200's you'll even be able to
run and still cast spells, although it will only seldom work ;)

Talarin, High Elven Wizard

P.S. And no, its not something new that was just added in the last patch,
it has been around since beta ;) You're probably just now getting your
skill high enough where its finally kicking it every so often ;)


----- Original Message -----
From: John Penman <jpenman@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 11:43 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Unfair?


> From: "John Penman" <jpenman@...>
>
> Well I think they have taken some of this in to consideration because it
> seems they added somehting new to last nights patch. During the game last
> night I received a message while in combat taht stated "You regained
> concentration" and it cast my spells after it told me I lost
concentration.
> Could be the first steps...? Who knows.
>
> Shadair
